text: Muşrikon ʙa saxttarin qasamho ʙa Alloh savgand jod kardand, ki agar Muhammad mū'çizae ʙar mo ʙijovarad, ʙa ū imon meovarem. Bigū (ej Pajomʙar): «Hamono hamai mū'çizaho nazdi Alloh ast va Ū qodir ast ʙar ovardani on, har vaqte ki xohad va şumo (ej mū'minon) az kuço medoned, ki agar mū'çizae ham nozil şavad, imon nameovarand»
